kodi-rubber-base-acid-free-15ml.title: Non-Acid Rubber Base (15 ml)
description: Clear base Rubber Base Acid Free (15 ml).
Medium viscosity, easy to apply, self-leveling.
Wear lasts 14–21 days depending on nail condition.
Medium firmness; not recommended for thin or fragile nails.
Acid-free formula with pH equal to water.
Recommendation: use Ultrabond before application; remove mechanically.
